languages.text: "Ты охвачен безумием. Или хуже — чарами Хаоса. Если не придешь в себя, твоя участь предрешена. Очнись и ответь мне внятно — что здесь произошло?"
"You've been consumed by madness. Or worse — Chaos sorcery. If you don't come to your senses, your fate is sealed. Snap out of it and speak clearly — what happened here?"
languages.original_text: "Ты охвачен безумием. Или хуже — чарами Хаоса. Если не придешь в себя, твоя участь предрешена. Очнись и ответь мне внятно — что здесь произошло?"

traits.locale_text: "You've been consumed by madness. Or worse — Chaos sorcery. If you don't come to your senses, your fate is sealed. Snap out of it and speak clearly — what happened here?"
"You've been consumed by madness. Or worse — Chaos sorcery. If you don't come to your senses, your fate is sealed. Snap out of it and speak clearly — what happened here?"
"You've been consumed by madness. Or worse — Chaos sorcery. If you don't come to your senses, your fate is sealed. Snap out of it and speak clearly — what happened here?"
"You've been consumed by madness. Or worse — Chaos sorcery. If you don't come to your senses, your fate is sealed. Snap out of it and speak clearly — what happened here?"
"You've been consumed by madness. Or worse — Chaos sorcery. If you don't come to your senses, your fate is sealed. Snap out of it and speak clearly — what happened here?"
"You've been consumed by madness. Or worse — Chaos sorcery. If you don't come to your senses, your fate is sealed. Snap out of it and speak clearly — what happened here?"

languages.text: “你已经被疯狂所吞噬，甚至可能更糟，被混沌巫术所吞噬。如果你不清醒过来，你就在劫难逃了。快打起精神，说清楚，这里究竟发生了什么事情？”
languages.original_text: "You've been consumed by madness. Or worse — Chaos sorcery. If you don't come to your senses, your fate is sealed. Snap out of it and speak clearly — what happened here?"

traits.locale_text: “你已经被疯狂所吞噬，甚至可能更糟，被混沌巫术所吞噬。如果你不清醒过来，你就在劫难逃了。快打起精神，说清楚，这里究竟发生了什么事情？”

languages.text: «Le consume la locura, o peor, la hechicería del Caos. Si no recupera el sentido, su destino estará sellado. Recapacite y hable con claridad: ¿qué ha sucedido aquí?».
languages.original_text: "You've been consumed by madness. Or worse — Chaos sorcery. If you don't come to your senses, your fate is sealed. Snap out of it and speak clearly — what happened here?"

traits.locale_text: «Le consume la locura, o peor, la hechicería del Caos. Si no recupera el sentido, su destino estará sellado. Recapacite y hable con claridad: ¿qué ha sucedido aquí?».

languages.text: 「狂気に飲み込まれたか。いや、むしろ―渾沌の魔術だな。正気に戻れなければ、行き着く先は変えられない。目を覚まして、ハッキリと話せ―ここで何があった？」
languages.original_text: "You've been consumed by madness. Or worse — Chaos sorcery. If you don't come to your senses, your fate is sealed. Snap out of it and speak clearly — what happened here?"

traits.locale_text: 「狂気に飲み込まれたか。いや、むしろ―渾沌の魔術だな。正気に戻れなければ、行き着く先は変えられない。目を覚まして、ハッキリと話せ―ここで何があった？」

languages.text: "Euch hat der Wahnsinn verschlungen. Oder Schlimmeres – Chaos-Zauberei. Wenn Ihr nicht zur Vernunft kommt, ist Euer Schicksal besiegelt. Kommt zu Euch und sprecht – was ist hier passiert?"
languages.original_text: "You've been consumed by madness. Or worse — Chaos sorcery. If you don't come to your senses, your fate is sealed. Snap out of it and speak clearly — what happened here?"

traits.locale_text: "Euch hat der Wahnsinn verschlungen. Oder Schlimmeres – Chaos-Zauberei. Wenn Ihr nicht zur Vernunft kommt, ist Euer Schicksal besiegelt. Kommt zu Euch und sprecht – was ist hier passiert?"

languages.text: « Vous êtes possédé par la folie. Ou pire encore, par les maléfices du Chaos. Si vous ne vous reprenez pas rapidement, votre sort est scellé. Ressaisissez-vous et exprimez-vous clairement... Que s'est-il passé ici ? »
languages.original_text: "You've been consumed by madness. Or worse — Chaos sorcery. If you don't come to your senses, your fate is sealed. Snap out of it and speak clearly — what happened here?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous êtes possédé par la folie. Ou pire encore, par les maléfices du Chaos. Si vous ne vous reprenez pas rapidement, votre sort est scellé. Ressaisissez-vous et exprimez-vous clairement... Que s'est-il passé ici ? »

languages.text: "Delilikle yanıp kül olmuşsun. Belki de daha kötüsü... Kaos sahirliğine kapılmışsın. Aklını başına toplamadığın sürece akıbetin belli. Kendine gel ve şu soruma düzgünce cevap ver: Burada ne oldu?"
languages.original_text: "You've been consumed by madness. Or worse — Chaos sorcery. If you don't come to your senses, your fate is sealed. Snap out of it and speak clearly — what happened here?"

traits.locale_text: "Delilikle yanıp kül olmuşsun. Belki de daha kötüsü... Kaos sahirliğine kapılmışsın. Aklını başına toplamadığın sürece akıbetin belli. Kendine gel ve şu soruma düzgünce cevap ver: Burada ne oldu?"
